name: Circle map (quasi-periodic regime)
description_simple: A discrete-time map on the circle that, in certain parameter regimes, produces quasi-periodic motion without chaos.
description_complex: A deterministic map on the unit circle that combines rigid rotation by frequency Ω with a sinusoidal perturbation of strength K. For small K and irrational Ω (e.g., the golden ratio conjugate), trajectories densely fill an invariant curve, yielding quasi-periodic motion with no strange attractor, no positive Lyapunov exponent, and no deterministic chaos.
